org.apache.spark.ml.util

类 MLWriter

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.ml.util.MLWriter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Logging
    直接已知子类:
    CrossValidatorModel.CrossValidatorModelWriter, TrainValidationSplitModel.TrainValidationSplitModelWriter

    public abstract class MLWriter
extends Object
implements Logging
    Abstract class for utility classes that can save ML instances.

    • 构造器概要

      • option

        public MLWriter option(String key,
                       String value)
        Adds an option to the underlying MLWriter. See the documentation for the specific model's writer for possible options. The option name (key) is case-insensitive.
        参数:
        key - (undocumented)
        value - (undocumented)
        返回:
        (undocumented)
